name: Mouse Dreams
storyline: Squeaks the Mouse likes two things more than anything...eating cheese and sleeping. But when Squeaks sleeps, Squeaks dreams! And in those dreams are fantastic houses full of cheese and switches and levers and moving shelves and ghosts and all kinds of puzzles that stop Squeaks from getting to that delicious cheese!
summary:
Get the cheese and get to the exit. It's that easy. Or is it? 
 
Mouse Dreams is a whimsical puzzle-platform game with bite-sized levels for all ages! 
 
Control moving platforms, manipulate light, escape from ghosts, find the hidden red cheese and more!
